title: LeaverBuster for having a bug
body:
Patch 7.1 fixed a problem where I couldnt go to the loading screen. Now I got 19min LeaverBuster (the times I insist was because I was trying to understand where was the problem).

Any way to get me out of this?

replies.body: The only way to remove [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) peanlties is by playing without leaving games.  I'd like to help resolve whatever is causing you to failing loading in, but need more details.  Let me know if you're getting any errors, and what you're seeing exactly.  I'm happy to help!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PfNNYidi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-12T18:07:10.897+0000)
>
> The only way to remove [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) peanlties is by playing without leaving games.  I'd like to help resolve whatever is causing you to failing loading in, but need more details.  Let me know if you're getting any errors, and what you're seeing exactly.  I'm happy to help!

Not trying to sound rude or anything, but that's just stupid. It's one thing if the player leaves intentionally, and it's another if they get disconnected thanks to the client's spaghetti coding. Right now I'm sitting in low priority queue for 20 minutes for my next 5 games, possibly longer. I tried the Alt+Enter "quick fix," but that only seems to have made it worse :/

Hi, porocles.

As I said, patch 7.1 already fixed the problem. Just was wondering if there was a way to get me out of leaverbuster, because it's seriously annoying have to wait 20min+ queue, since I didnt leave the matchs on purpose.

I reported the problem when it happened: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/z6TxNfRJ-not-going-to-loading-screen
